result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh sé sa bhaile anois nó d'fhág sé an teach seo uair an chloig ó shin

result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ga: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair

result.eng: There was hunger in every house at that time.
result.ga: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sin

result.html: Bhíodh ocras i chuile theach an uair sinThere was hunger in every house at that time.

result.eng: We must do it right this time.
result.ga: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seo

result.html: Caithfidh muid é a dhéanamh i gceart an uair seoWe must do it right this time.

result.eng: I went around the house several times.

result.eng: How many times did they fail?

result.eng: Ten shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.

result.eng: The exam lasted an hour and a half.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.orig: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig

result.eng: I met Dara once already.
result.ga: Chas mé ar Dhara uair amháin cheana

result.eng: I saw her here a couple of times with your son Dara.

result.eng: This is the first time that my children and I are on vacation since.

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.
